Articles.Content:
My game crashed three times in a row. Both of my Jool exploration probes were consumed by the Kraken.

Here is the error report:

[LOG 16:10:27.803] Look rotation viewing vector is zero[LOG 16:10:27.804] Look rotation viewing vector is zero

[LOG 16:10:27.804] Look rotation viewing vector is zero

[ERR 16:10:27.805] Inertia tensor must be larger then zero in all coordinates.

[ERR 16:10:27.806] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.

[ERR 16:10:27.807] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.

[ERR 16:10:27.807] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.

[ERR 16:10:27.808] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.

[ERR 16:10:27.821] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.

[ERR 16:10:27.822] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.

Can this be explained?

Thanks.
You'll need the output_log.txt file (you'll find it in the KSP_Data folder) to explain this properly. The KSP.log simply doesn't give enough useful information.

I can't seem to navigate that file.....

It seems there's a lot of Null Reference Exceptions or something...
Upload it to http://www.justpaste.it/ so I can have a look.

It's uh...

Too big...

For justpasteit....

Sorry.

The file is more than 15 MB.

O.o

That's thoroughly impressive. Can you throw it up on Mediafire or Dropbox, or perhaps Google Drive?
